name: The Lake House: Children of Silence HD - A Hidden Object Game with Hidden Objects
name_original: The Lake House: Children of Silence HD - A Hidden Object Game with Hidden Objects
description:
Try this immersive, high-quality game for FREE! Then continue the adventure with a ONE TIME unlock!
NO VIRTUAL ITEMS, NO INTERRUPTIONS… you’ll OWN this game for life.

Long-forgotten memories bubble to the surface when the past invades the present in this outstanding Collector’s Edition!

• A SINGLE EVENT CAN CHANGE A LIFE…A FAMILY…A TOWN
Located at the edge of a gloomy lake and shrouded in fog, the house at the center of this story has stood empty for 15 years after a boy mysteriously disappeared.

• A WOMAN IS BECKONED BY A GHOST
Return to her childhood Lake House to solve a mystery that begins with an old photograph and ends in a secret room.

• UNLOCK THE COLLECTOR’S EDITION AND GAIN ACCESS TO AMAZING BONUSES!
There are over 50 locations to explore and more than 40 intricate mini-games/puzzles to play that will keep you on the path to solving this mystery.

• SOME MEMORIES SHOULD REMAIN BURIED!
Find hidden objects, solve puzzles and prepare yourself for an ending that will take you to a place darker than you can imagine!
